    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(int num_players,
              int startingMoney,
              int bblind,
              int port,
              HThread master,
              java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger status)
       throws java.io.IOException,
              java.lang.InterruptedException
        Constructs a server that sends and receives game state update messages to and from the client
        Parameters:
        num_players - The max number of players
        startingMoney - The starting money every player gets
        bblind - The amount of money the big blind is
        port - The port the server is being hosted on
        master - The Thread which creates the server
        status - An integer that allows the user to start the game with any number of players less than 5 connected
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

    • Method Detail

      • nextCmd

        public java.lang.String[] nextCmd(int id)
                           throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Stalls the server until a message is received from a particular user
        Parameters:
        id - The user id
        Returns:
        An array of parsed strings representing the message form the user
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • executeCmd

        public int executeCmd(java.lang.String process)
        Executes a command on the server
        Parameters:
        process - The command message
        Returns:
        0 if the message was a known operation otherwise it returns -1
